price: The evil consequences of their deeds will become apparent to them, and they will be overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule.
arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
